awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Investigations in Spectral & Fractal Geometry: Vibrations of Fractal Drums, Spectral Zeta        Functions, Analysis on Fractals, & Variational Elliptic
awd_abstract_narration: Lapidus will investigate sharpened forms of the asymptotic                 formula for the eigenvalue distribution of Laplacians with                      various boundary conditions.  The goal is to make yet clearer the               role of the Minkowski dimension of the boundary in this                         distribution.  There are analogous formulas for the trace of the                associated heat semigroup.  The case in which not only the                      boundary of the domain, but the domain itself, is fractal will be               studied.                                                                             The relationship between the geometry of a manifold and the                invariants of the elliptic differential operators on it is one of               the main unifying themes of contemporary mathematics.  The case                 of a region with fractal boundary, so irregular that its                        dimension is no longer an integer, has been the setting for some                recent breakthroughs relating spectra information to geometry.                  This work has applications to the study of porous media and the                 scattering of waves from fractal surfaces.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
